Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Nagaritha Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Nagaritha Drive and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Nagaritha Drive heads off to the west from Riverdell Way, making its trek through the southern parts of Oceancrest. Riverdell Way runs north and south from the intersection, notably running through the eastern section of town from one City Wall to the other. On the southwest corner of the road, you can see the Bows & Arrows Unlimited Shop where you can purchase a number of finely crafted bows made by the finest elven fletchers.
